Title: Sye Raa Narasimha Reddy
Story: A historical action epic inspired by the life of Uyyalawada Narasimha Reddy, who revolted against the atrocities of East India Company 10 years before the Sepoy Mutiny.

Title: Evaru
Story: Sub-inspector Vikram Vasudev is entrusted with the task of investigating the murder of a high ranking officer who was killed by his alleged rape victim. When he delves deeper into the case he uncovers some surprising facts.

Title: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
Story: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is an authentic humorous investigative thriller revolving around the adventures of a detective based out of Nellore.

Title: Rakshasudu
Story: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen girls and murders them brutally.

Title: Khaidi
Story: A drug bust, an injured cop and a convicted criminal who wants to meet his daughter for first time in life, what happens when they all cross their path is the story of this emotional action flick.

Title: Chitralahari
Story: Down on luck and depressed by constant failures in personal and professional life, Vijay is desperately in search of that single stroke of fortune that could turn his life around. But what if the power to rewrite his destiny lies within?

Title: Jersey
Story: A failed cricketer decides to revive his cricketing career in his late 30's despite everyone being skeptical of his ability to do so.

Title: Maharshi
Story: Rishi, a millionaire businessman, returns to his homeland, where he becomes the champion of poor and downtrodden farmers.

Title: Mallesham
Story: The life of Padma Shri winner Chintakindi Mallesham, who invented the the Asu machine that processes yarn for sarees mechanically, is being recreated in this biopic.

Title: Majili
Story: A former cricket player nursing his wounds of a failed relationship takes up the task of training his ex-lover's daughter and in the process discovers his feelings towards his wife and her unrequited love for him.

Title: Brochevarevarura
Story: This is the story of 'R3 batch' consisting of Rocky, Rambo and Rahul, three friends who keep failing every year and are stuck with studying inter.

Title: Raja Vaaru Rani Gaaru
Story: Raja Vaaru Rani Gaaru is the story of Raju who falls in love with Rani but is unable to express his emotions. Set in a beautiful village, watch as Raju and two of his friends deal with the toils and troubles of romance.

Title: Prati Roju Pandaage
Story: With only a few weeks left to live, an aging grandfather is visited by his grandson who wishes to fulfill his desires.

Title: Bigil
Story: A former football player struggles to fulfill the dream of his friend and seek revenge for the death of his father.

Title: Mudra
Story: An investigative journalist is arrested for cheating banks with fake certificates. He discovers a crime syndicate behind the scam and decides to investigate it himself.

Title: Mathu Vadalara
Story: The movie shows the events that occur in the life of a character who suffers from the rare disorder of hypersomnia and explains the health effects that are caused by the disorder.

Title: Kolaigaran
Story: A man on a murder spree meets his match in a brilliant police officer, and a cat-and-mouse game ensues.

Title: F2: Fun and Frustration
Story: After Venky, Varun also gets married thinking he can keep the wife in control but both of them get frustrated with the marital life which generates fun.

Title: Gang Leader
Story: Nani plays the gang leader of five women belonging to different age groups, helping them to plot revenge.

Title: Sarvam Thaala Mayam
Story: A mridangam maker's son, who aspires to learn the instrument from a maestro and become a mridangam player, has to cross social and personal barriers to reach his goal.

Title: Venky Mama
Story: A story of nephew and a son which revolves around their emotions and village drama and army based story.

Title: Meeku Matrame Chepta
Story: Rakesh, in an effort to woo his fiance, has promised her that he is a teetotaler. But when a compromising video of his leaks just two days before his wedding, all hell breaks loose.

Title: Falaknuma Das
Story: Set in the backdrop of the colonies of falaknuma where a group of youngsters fall into unexpected consequences which lead them to a driving pathway of violence, brutality and ruthlessness.

Title: Gaddalakonda Ganesh
Story: An aspiring filmmaker who wants to direct a realistic story, stumbles upon a menacing villain and to learn the nitty-gritties of the villain's character, he puts his and his friend's life on the line.

Title: Ninu Veedani Needanu Nene
Story: Ninu Veedani Needanu Nene is about a young man who gets mired in a dire situation and comes out successfully.
